programme.title: Hoarders S12
programme.desc: A reality-TV show that features compulsive hoarders--people who are addicted to filling their homes with objects--and how that spills out into their lives.

programme.title: Game Of Talents UK
programme.desc: In Game of Talents performers will entertain and amaze. But there's a catch - the viewers and the contestants have no idea what those talents are. Can you tell the fire eater from the footballer or the line dancer from the lion tamer?

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S2
programme.desc: Each episode of this cooking competition begins at the scene of the crime -- a kitchen that was just used to make an amazing, mouthwatering dessert that has since disappeared. To take the $100,000 prize, the competing dessert makers will need to prove they have the technical know-how, imagination and problem-solving skills needed to decode and re-create incredible desserts and cakes from across the world.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Spice Trail Adventure
programme.desc: Joanna Lumley takes an intrepid 15,000-mile voyage from the remote Banda Islands in Indonesia to the stunning natural landscapes of Jordan in the Middle East, revealing the story of how West met East and how the battle to control the cultivation and sale of spices dictated the course of history for centuries.

programme.title: Survivor 45
programme.desc: 18 new castaways battle it out on the islands of Fiji for a million dollars and the title of Sole Survivor.

programme.title: Supa Strikas
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Malay) Follow Shakes, Rasta and the rest of the Supa Strikas on their quest to become the world's greatest football team!

programme.title: Beyblade Burst Surge
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Malay) (Dual Language - English and Malay) A legend of legends, Valt Aoi hosts an exhibition match featuring a revolutionary class of Bey: "Lightning Beys". Inspired by the battle, two unknown brothers, Hyuga and Hikaru Hizashi, issue a challenge: armed with their solar Beys Hyperion and Helios, this unlikely duo is going to topple Beyblade's ruling elite.

programme.title: Squared Zebra S1
programme.desc: Polly the striped zebra, Rodion the elephant, Gosha the crocodile, Yana the monkey, Pasha the ostrich and his little brother Petya the egg-- happily live in a jungle on a faraway island, where every day is full of adventures (and the occasional arguments). With Squared Zebra by their side, the friends learn to appreciate the beauty of the world and to value individual traits in both others and themselves!

programme.title: Tish Tash
programme.desc: Tish Tash follows the adventures of a young bear called Tish, her bear family and her larger-than-life imaginary friend Tash, as they learn about the world around them.

programme.title: Paula & Pals S2
programme.desc: When Paula and Tim plan a surprise birthday party for Billy, Billy feels left out by his friends.

programme.title: Paula & Pals S2
programme.desc: Paula, Tim & Farm tries to get Billy's hat from the rooster when they discover that Billy treasures it so much.

programme.title: Sesame Street S51
programme.desc: This season is all about playful problem solving, with the recurring use of the mantra "I wonder, what if, let's try!".

programme.desc: The return of the Bafta and International Emmy-winning series for pre-school children that encourages physical activity. programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc: When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back.

programme.title: Pokemon Master Journeys: The Series (S24)
programme.desc: Join the continuing research fellowship adventures of Alola Champion Ash Ketchum and Goh, as they travel across all eight regions, including the new Galar region and Crown Tundra, based at Cerise Laboratory in Vermillion City in the Kanto region.

programme.title: Animal Impossible
programme.desc: Tim Warwood and Adam Gendle risk life and limb to uncover the truth about animals in this eye-opening and entertaining series. Do cats always land on their feet? Could a squid sink a ship? Is spider silk really stronger than steel? The intrepid pair quiz experts and conduct audacious stunts - including a nerve-wracking swim with a great white shark - to get answers. But they find more than they expected, discovering a whole host of strange and remarkable truths about the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Famous Foodies S3
programme.desc: Famous Foodies tells you about what & where the celebrities eat, from healthy lifestyles to haute cuisine.

programme.title: Love Again
programme.desc: A young woman tries to ease the pain of her fianc's death by sending romantic texts to his old cell phone number, and forms a connection with the man the number has been reassigned to.

programme.title: Planet Action S4
programme.desc: Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released. Each episode you'll get all the secrets straight from your favorite action heroes, get exclusive trivia and special reports from the most dangerous film sets, and get insight information on how the filmmakers make giant monsters come to life. This show is a sci-fi, cowboy, world-destruction, action-combo that will literally blow your mind!

programme.title: Vivo
programme.desc: A music-loving kinkajou embarks on the journey of a lifetime to fulfill his destiny and deliver a love song for an old friend.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: (Live) The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Kumar Vs The World
programme.desc: A.I. is taking over! From smart homes to robotic doctors, technology is evolving faster than Kumar can keep up. He dives into the world of A.I. with fun facts, shocking truths, a wild celebrity gameshow and quirky panel discussion to see if anyone actually understands how technology is changing our lives. It's Kumar VS A.I.!

programme.title: Book Of Love
programme.desc: A British writer realizes that his novel is a success in Mexico because of a peculiar translation of it.

programme.title: The Professor & The Madman
programme.desc: Professor James Murray begins work compiling words for the first edition of the Oxford English Dictionary in the mid-19th century, and receives over 10,000 entries from a patient at Broadmoor Criminal Lunatic Asylum, Dr. William Minor.

programme.desc: Liv, Andy, and Mike are three teens who form the ultra-secret Ghostforce, a squad of superheroes with ghostly powers! With the help of the mysterious Glowboo and an arsenal of high-tech invented by their mentor, Miss Jones, our heroes battle and capture the ghosts that haunt New York City... before racing back to school for their next class!

programme.title: Space Nova S2
programme.desc: It's 2162 and following the Novas incredible meeting with the Stardustians, everything we thought we knew about the universe has changed. Even the Novas' home base, Luna Port has become a major space station, home to entire new fields of science and learning. Still, despite all their incredible adventures, the Novas' greatest quest is ahead of them; they've just been invited to visit the Stardustian homeworld!

programme.title: Pokemon Ultimate Journeys: The Series [S25]
programme.desc: The stakes are higher than ever for Ash, Goh, and Chloe as they advance toward their goals! As the Pokemon World Coronation Series tournament heats up, intensive training is in store for Ash, Pikachu, and their Pokemon friends.

programme.title: On The Red Dot
programme.desc: Rozz joins renowned conductor Wong Kah Chun as he leads over 80 musicians in the season-opening concert with one of Japan's top orchestras.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: Steven Chia investigates why pigeons seem to love our concrete jungle so much - and just how bad pigeon poop actually is for our health!

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Ella continues to reel from the disappointment of being rejected by Derek. Zaryf is in denial about his interest in Hidayah. Meanwhile, Ella discovers a secret about Steven and confronts Jessica about it.

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals S3
programme.desc: Liam Charles and Tom Allen host the toughest Bake Off on TV. Twelve teams from top hotels, restaurants and small businesses compete to be crowned best patisserie team in Britain. Once again, judges Cherish Finden and Benoit Blin set exceedingly tricky challenges, to test the teams' creativity and precision. From towering, skyline-inspired chocolate constructions, to geometric tarts with moving parts, these incredible creations showcase bakers at the peak of their profession.

programme.title: Celebrity Catch Phrase S7
programme.desc: In this entertaining series packed with laughs, celebrity contestants attempt to work out catchphrases based on fun animations. Animations include well known phrases, sayings and even film, song and book titles. The celebrities need to buzz in as quickly as they can when they know the answer and can say what they see in a chance to win money for their chosen charities.

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal Australia S12
programme.desc: The exhilarating hit game show where contestants must beat The Banker to win a huge cash prize, is making a triumphant return. The ultimate contest of nerve, luck and pure gut instinct will be fronted by one of Australia's most beloved TV presenters, Gold Logie winner Grant Denyer.

programme.desc: Pat Sajak hosts his final season of Wheel of Fortune.

programme.title: Makan Time Stories S3
programme.desc: Chef Chris cooks up a storm while Nick plays sous chef—and star player on the Ultimate Frisbee field! From Spanish meatballs to a rare “kaima uranda curry,” he grinds hard on the batu giling to earn his bite. Artists rise, a princess paints, and Peranakan-Indian recipes shine. Only on Makan Time Stories.

programme.title: Scene City: Trade Secrets
programme.desc: Trade Secrets centres around 21-year-old University student, Wing, who seeks comfort and attention in an adults-only site. One night, she chances upon a male student filming another student showering without her consent. She faces the moral dilemma of either keeping mum and getting through school in peace, or exposing him and risk getting her own secret exposed.

programme.title: Red Eye (UK)
programme.desc: The series follows DC Hana Li, a British-Chinese police officer who escorts Dr. Matthew Nolan, a murder suspect, back to Beijing. However, Hana suspects foul play when an incident occurs on the flight. Hana's sister, Jess, a journalist, helps uncover the conspiracy in London.

programme.title: The Librarians S3

programme.title: 那一年的除夕夜
programme.desc: 晨曦还保留着2003年一仁来过的记忆。17仁看到两人在一起，气愤。一仁想以穿越证明自己是未来人，但是没有成功。流浪汉和一仁在无人的情况下再试一次，结果回到2024年。袁洁来找一仁，和同伙骗他10万。流浪汉惹怒沈悦，变出彩虹逗她开心。一仁无奈没有改变晨曦的死，却意外发现伟文的脚没有瘸，双脚健全，惊喜。.
